cgcloud__Condition_Search_Group__c.name: cgcloud__Condition_Search_Group__c
cgcloud__Condition_Search_Group__c.description: Holds the attributes of Condition Search Group.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Required. Default name of this record.

cgcloud__Aggregation_Rule__c.description: Defines how the individual rules of the search group must be aggregated.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user specific language.

cgcloud__Group_Code__c.description: Defines the code used in KPI Definition.
